radiographic_examinations.findings: No obstruction, free air, or stones

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Area of sigmoid diverticulosis, thickening of the wall of the sigmoid colon, and a peripherally calcified right iliac artery with infiltration of the surrounding fat
No flow in the right common femoral artery and absent systolic pressures in the right ankle
Active bleeding in the rectosigmoid colon
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Confirmed site of bleeding consistent with an apparent arterioenteric fistula
